column1: Little Goat Diner////Went there on a saturday afternoon. Waited a bit
column2: not a big problem. Ordered a great mocha while waiting. Got Â sat
column3: service was pretty good once he made it to our table. Based on everything I read/heard I expected something more. Yes
column5: taste etc is subjective but the food I had (BBQ Pork Sammie) was barely good even by diner standards. And for the price and low quality food
column6: I wouldnt go back. Lesson learned. Note as you go in
